m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- News:Archive:2014:February Click here for most recent news. 2014 News:Archive:2014:March - going forward in time February Friday, February 28, 2014 The Ultimate Power Grab - ..."power grabs" by the powers that be, including new road taxes to extract money from electric vehicle drivers that are not buying gas. They also address the "smart grid" that isn't so smart and doesn't save money. (Free Energy Blog; February 28, 2014) Featured : News > SmartScarecrow > This Week in Free Energy™ > This Week in Free Energy™: February 27, 2014: Last Smartscarecrow Episode -
